document_data.mainbody:
Sharna was the oldest and preeminent of Vhaemas the Bastards children.
Sharna was born in 1340 DR to Vhaemas and Eaja Kamaar.
She participated in the Twelfth Ser√¥s War following her father at Iakhovass side.
Sharna was full of hate for her grandfather. She was a capable leader for her people.
